heroSlides.title: Integrated Lifestyle Community in Sultan Haitham City
heroSlides.description: Discover an integrated lifestyle in Oman’s distinguished destination, blending luxury, smart living, and contemporary design amidst nature and community.

heroSlides.title: Seaside Luxury at Al‑Shakhakhit Coast
heroSlides.description: Experience premium coastal living with world-class amenities, sustainable design, and a vibrant community by the sea.

heroSlides.title: Modern Coastal Living at the Coast
heroSlides.description: Enjoy the perfect blend of seaside tranquility and contemporary architecture with seamless connectivity to urban conveniences.
